DOC.criteria: Participants nonsmoking male nonpregnant female age 2045y , normal glycemia good health . A total 12 participant include , approximately half male & half female , half normal weight ( BMI > 19.0 < 25.0 ) half overweight obese ( BMI > 25.0 < 30 ) . Thus , few 5 male , 5 female , 5 normal weight 5 overweight obese subject include . Additional inclusion criterion include : Absence diabetes , impair glucose tolerance impair fast glucose , define fast plasma glucose < 5.6 mmol/L ( 100 mg/dL ) AND plasma glucose level < 7.8 mmol/L ( 140 mg/dL ) 2h consumption 50 g glucose drink ( OGTT administer screen visit ) Systolic blood pressure 100150 mmHg inclusive Diastolic blood pressure 6090 mmHg inclusive Resting heart rate 5090 beats/min inclusive 3 minute rest Able refrain eat legume drink alcohol day test session Fasting triglycerides < 2.0 mmol/L ( 178 mg/dL ) Fasting HDL cholesterol > 0.9 mmol/L ( 35 mg/dL ) males > 1.1mmol/L ( 42 mg/dL ) females Fasting LDL cholesterol < 5.0 mmol/L ( 193 mg/dL ) AST ALT < 120 % upper limit normal ( ULN ) hsCRP < 10 mg/L Urea creatinine < 150 % ULN failure meet one inclusion criterion age less 18 45 year know history AIDS , hepatitis , diabetes heart condition participant use medication condition might , opinion Dr. Wolever , president GI Testing , either : 1 ) make participation dangerous subject others , 2 ) affect result participant comply experimental procedure follow GI Labs safety guideline .
